inn1.comm: short of a length delivery pitches in line with the stumps and angles across the left-hander, Jayasuriya stays in his crease and cuts towards cover point
fuller length with a hint of movement across the left-hander, Jayasuriya gets on the front foot to drive but gets beaten
Jayasuriya stays on the back foot to a short of a length ball and punches towards cover
played off the back foot towards cover for a single
good length from Munaf, he pitches it outside off and takes the ball away from the left-hander, Warnapura moves forward and shoulders arms

short of a length delivery pitches outside off and swings a fair bit away from Warnapura who flashes at it, the ball beats the bat and is collected by Dhoni, the Indians appeal for a catch, don;t think he nicked that, it was just swing
full length delivery outside off stump, Jayasuriya moves forward and swings his bat extremely hard, he was trying to hit it through cover but didn't make contact
short of a length this time and the ball swings away from Jayasuriya after pitching outside off, the batsman lets it go
defended on the front foot towards the bowler

caught! Zaheer strikes in his first over! the ball isn't the best, it is on the shorter side and there's width outside off stump as well, Jayasuriya takes a step forward and slashes hard at the ball, he is looking to hit the ball over point but the movement away from the left-hander results in a top-edge that flies high and straight towards Ojha at third man, he takes a well-judged catch
left alone outside off stump
full ball angling into the left-hander, defended back to the bowler

that was close! Warnapura pushed the ball towards cover and set off for a quick single, the fielder reacted quickly and fired the throw in at the bowler's end, the ball hit Warnapura's bat and deflected past the stumps, he was quite a long way out of his ground
defended on the back foot
banged in short outside the off stump, the ball climbs on Udawatte who lets it go through to Dhoni
good length on middle and off, Udawatte defends on the front foot
tight line and length around middle and off, Udawatte strides forward and blocks on the leg side
Udawatte sees a good length ball shaping away from him and tries to drive the ball hard through cover, he gets beaten by the seam movement away from him
Zaheer hits a good length just outside off and angles the ball into the left-hander, Warnapura leans forward and drives towards cover
smashed! The length is too full outside off stump, Udawatte moves forward and towards the line of the ball before connecting with a powerful cover drive through the in-field
a short of a length delivery moves away from the left-hander, Udawatte tries to cut but gets beaten this time
defended towards point from his crease
excellent ball, Zaheer pitches on a good length outside off and the ball goes straight through, Udawatte moves forward to defend but plays just inside the line
tight line an length around off, Udawatte defends on the front foot towards the bowler
a short of a length delivery slants across the left-hander, Warnapura moves forward and lets it go
played towards point off the back foot
good length delivery pitches in line with the stumps, Warnapura stays in his crease and plays the ball towards the off side
short of a length delivery on a wicket-to-wicket line, Warnapura moves back and tries to work the ball off his hips but he misses
another short of a length delivery gets big on the left-hander just outside the off stump, Warnapura tries to steer the ball behind point but gets a bottom edge into the ground
a short of a length ball moves into the left-hander this time, Warnapura tries to play the drive but inside-edges the ball on to his thigh
the ball isn't that short and the extra bounce hurries Udawatte into the pull shot, he mis-times it towards mid-on

loud appeal for lbw, Zaheer bowled the ball fuller and angled it into the left-hander, it was the inswinger, Udawatte came across his stumps to try and swing the ball on the leg side, he got hit on the front pad, that would have missed leg and may have been a touch high as well
played towards point on the back foot, Udawatte wants the single but Warnapura sends him back
short of a length outside the off stump, Udawatte stays in his crease and slashes at the ball, trying to hit it through cover point, he doesn't make contact for the ball was too far away from him
he stays in his crease this time and steers the ball towards third man
good length angling into middle stump, Warnapura stays in his crease and plays the ball towards mid-on
driven off the back foot towards cover point
the line is a bit too straight from Munaf, Udawatte moves back in his crease and flicks the ball through square leg

what happened there? Warnapura defends the ball towards the bowler, Munaf fields on his follow through and throws the ball hard at the batsman, Warnapura instinctively puts his bat up to prevent the ball from hitting him and the ball goes towards third man, Udawatte begins to run but Warnapura says no
defended towards the off side
played off the back foot, Munaf's not giving the batsman any room to work with
good length outside off stump, Udawatte plants his front foot forward and throws his bat hard at the ball, once again he fails to connect
there's a free hit coming up, Zaheer oversteps while bowling a good length ball on off stump, defended towards the leg side, this is the first front-foot no-ball by India in the series
Udawatte clears his front foot out of the way and slashes hard, the hits the free hit towards third man
Warnapura sees a bit of width outside off stump and attempts to cut, he gets a top edge over the slip cordon for four

dropped, tough chance though, the length was full and the line was outside off stump, Warnapura got on to the front foot and square drove the ball extremely hard towards Sharma at cover point, he leapt in the air and got hands to the ball which flew above his head but couldn't hold on for it was struck so hard, excellent effort
defended on the back foot towards the off side
played towards Yuvraj at mid-on for a single
short of a length delivery on leg and middle stump, Warnapura moves back and across to work the ball behind square
the good length ball pitches just outside off and lifts sharply on Udawatte who fends at it and gets beaten
fuller length and the line is on middle stump, Udawatte stays in his crease and closes the face of the bat to push the ball towards midwicket
Udawatte stands tall on the back foot and tries to play a drive through cover, he gets beaten by the extra bounce from a good length

full ball on off stump, Udawatte drives the ball hard into the ground and towards mid-off, the ball pitches well in front of Yuvraj, who runs in to field, and then bounces over his head and runs towards the long-off boundary, the fielder at mid-on gives chase
defended on the back foot
good length delivery angling into the left-hander, Udawatte drives the ball firmly towards point where Sharma fields
the length isn't that short but Udawatte gets on to the back foot and tries to pull, he mis-times the ball towards square leg
he's gone for it again! Udawatte gets into position to pull but the length isn't short enough and the ball comes on to him too quickly, once again he mis-times it, this time towards mid-on
banged in short outside leg stump, Udawatte moves across his stumps and tries to play another hook but this time he gets an edge that takes the ball past Dhoni towards the boundary, streaky stroke
played towards mid-off on the front foot
huge appeal for lbw, the slower ball on good length angles across the left-hander and hits the pad after Udawatte misses while trying to hit across the line, that would have gone past off stump
good length just outside off stump, Warnapura moves back and plays the square drive but can't place it past point
shot! Warnapura plants his front foot down the track and lofts a length ball from Zaheer through the line over the head of the fielder at mid-on, he made good contact that time
good length on middle and off, Warnapura pushes it with soft hands on the off side and calls for the single
Udawatte stays in his crease and steers the ball towards third man
defended towards point on the back foot
Munaf angles a good length ball across the left-hander from over the wicket, Warnapura hardly moves his feet while trying to steer the ball towards third man and gets beaten
the line is too straight and Udawatte tries to flick the ball off his pads behind square, he gets hit on the pad,  the batsmen run quickly and are able to take two
this time he makes contact and plays the ball towards fine leg for two more

Udawatte gets on to the front foot and launches a length ball over cover with a fierce swing of the bat, tremendous power in that shot, the fielder in the circle jumped to try and catch it but it was just out of his reach
Udawatte moves forward and opens the face to steer the ball through gully, once again the running is spectacular and they get two more
Udawatte moves back and across to work a ball off his hips towards square leg, he doesn't connect and gets hit on the thigh
cut off the back foot towards gully
he starts with a short of a length ball outside off stump, Warnapura begins to play at it but pulls his bat inside the line of the ball
the length is just a bit short and Warnapura pulls the ball powerfully wide of the fielder at mid-on, Munaf gives chase but can't catch it
good length delivery outside off stump, driven off the back foot towards cover point
banged in short by RP, angling into the left-hander, Warnapura ducks under the ball
driven back to the bowler on the front foot, RP collects and throws the ball towards the batsman who gets out of the way to allow the ball to pass through to Dhoni
too full outside off stump, Warnapura gets on to the front foot and drives the ball over the in-field at cover, he hit that hard
played towards backward point
good length just outside off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
too full once again on middle stump, Udawatte leans forward and drives the ball with force straight past the bowler, mid-on had no chance

Udawatte tries to work the ball off his hips but misses, the ball hits his body and drops on the pitch, Warnapura calls him through for a leg bye and Zaheer can't run quickly enough to the ball to prevent it
played off the back foot with an open face towards third man
full ball in the blockhole, Udawatte tries to dig it out but gets an edge past his stumps
short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot towards third man
Udawatte tries to drive the ball through the off side but gets cramped for room by the ball which angles into him, he gets an inside edge past his stumps towards fine leg
Warnapura comes down the track and plays a cross-bat swipe to a  good length ball, he mis-times it on the leg side
he tries to drive through the off side but gets cramped for room by RP's line which comes into the left-hander
played off the pads towards long leg for  a single
Udawatte is certainly middling his edges! Once again he tries to force the a good length ball through the off side and the inside edge misses his leg stump and goes quickly to the fine leg boundary
good length to start with outside off, played towards point
Warnapura moves his front foot a long way outside off and tries to sweep, he misses and gets hit on the pad, Pathan appeals but that isn't out
driven off the front foot towards point
too straight from Pathan, angling into middle stump, the batsman uses the angle to flick the ball off his pads through square leg
short and wide outside off stump, Warnapura uses the width to cut the ball towards the fielder at third man
good length but the line is outside off stump which allows Udawatte to drive hard into the ground, the ball bounces over the fielder at cover point
fuller ball outside off stump, Udawatte stays in his crease and steers the ball towards third man
RP pitches the ball short of a length and angles it into the left-handle from over the wicket, Warnapura jumps on to the back foot and takes one hand off the bat while defending towards the bowler
that's extremely wide outside off, he will have to re-bowl that
RP pitches the ball short of  a length outside off and seams it away from the left-hander, the batsman tries to run it towards third man but gets beaten
Warnapura drives the ball towards mid-off on the front foot
nicely played! Warnapura stays in his crease and opens the face of the bat late to guide a short of a length ball from outside off towards the third-man boundary
defended off the back foot towards the off side
good length delivery on off and middle, Udawatte moves back an across and plays the ball off his pads towards midwicket

caught! Warnapura charges Pathan, who pitches short of a length outside off stump, he tries to pull the ball from outside off towards the leg side and gets a top edge which goes high in the air towards cover, Gambhir runs back from cover and takes a well judged catch over his head
Udawatte plays the ball towards deep square leg to bring Sangakkara on strike
the line is too straight once again on middle and leg, Sangakkara walks across his stumps and flicks towards long leg

lbw! Double-strike from Pathan, he pitches the ball on a good length and skids it towards middle stump, Udawatte stays in his crease and moves across his stumps to play the ball on the leg side, he misses and the ball hits him on the pad in front of middle, that is plumb
that's too wide outside off, so one more ball to go in the over
played towards point on the back foot
too wide outside off stump once again, that's another extra
Sangakkara strides forward and defends the ball towards cover
good length on off stump, Sangakkara moves forward and defends on the off side
defended with a very straight bat towards the bowler

caught! Sri Lanka look like their in quicksand here, the ball is short of a length and wide outside off stump, nothing special about it, Sangakkara moves forward and reaches out  to hit the ball through point but plays far away from his body, he gets a thick edge that's snapped up by Gambhir at first slip
good length on middle and off stump, defended on the front foot towards the off side
Kapugedera gets behind the line on the back foot and defends with a straight bat
Jayawardene moves back and across his stumps to play a wristy flick behind square
Pathan hits a good length and angles the ball across the right-hander from over the wicket, Kapugedera pushes at it and gets beaten
short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot towards the off side
defended on the back foot
played back to the bowler on the back foot
Kapugendera gets behind the line of a good length delivery and defends on the off side
good length from RP on middle stump, Jayawardene strides forward and drives towards mid-on
that's too wide outside off stump, Jayawardene uses the width to play a smart-looking cut but it gets stopped at point
defended with soft hand son the off side
too straight on middle and leg stump, Jayawardene moves nimbly across his stumps and flicks the ball towards long leg

Jayawardene drives the ball straight past the bowler for a single, mid-on and mid-off both converge on the ball and Munaf, who was at mid-on, ends up kicking it past the fielder running in from mid-off
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Pathan's angle across the right-hander gives Jayawardene enough width to stay on the back foot and cut to third man
fuller length but the line is outside off stump and the ball moves further away from Kapugedera who moves forward and lets the ball go
short of a length just outside off stump, Kapugedera moves back and defends the ball on the off side with a straight bat
Kapugedera plays the back foot drive towards cover to a good length delivery from Pathan
Kapugedera goes back and across to flick the ball off his pads towards deep square leg
played towards point
tossed up on off stump, played off the back foot on the off side
Jayawardene moves back and works the ball off his pads towards midwicket
flighted delivery on middle and off stump, defended on the front foot
slightly shorter this time and Kapugedera stays in his crease and cuts the ball towards deep point
Ojha tosses it up on middle and off, the ball stops on Jayawardene as he defends on the front foot
width offered outside off and Jayawardene cuts off the back foot
Jayawardene stays in his crease and opens the face of the bat to play the ball towards third man
good length from Pathan just outside off, defended on the back foot towards the off side
disciplined line and length on middle and off, Kapugedera moves back and defends towards the bowler
once again he moves back to block a straight delivery, Pathan fields on his follow through
Kapugedera moves on to the back foot and times the ball well wide of Ojha at mid-on
full and wide outside off stump, Kapugedera leans forward, reaches for the ball, and plays an elegant cover drive to the fielder on the boundary
Ohja's getting the ball to dip nicely on the right-hander, Kapugedera defends but he didn't look very convincing

caught! or is it? Kapugedera leaned forward to defend but he closed the face of the bat too early, he was beaten by the flight and the dip, and the leading edge lobbed up towards Ojha, who dived forward at full length to take the catch, the Indians celebrated but the batsman stood his ground, the umpires refer it to the third umpire and replays showed that the ball had bounced just before Ojha got his hands around the ball
defended on the off side
defended towards the fielder at short cover
bowled flatter through the air on middle and off, defended on the front foot, Ojha completes a maiden over
Jayawardene moves back and opens the face of the bat to guide the ball towards third man
Kapugedera comes out of his crease to a flighted delivery, he doesn't get to the pitch of the ball and is hit on the pad while trying to defend
short of a length on leg stump, played off the pads behind square for  a single
good length delivery just outside off stump, Jayawardene moves forward and plays the ball towards point where the ball bounces awkwardly for Sharma and hits him on the mouth
pushed towards short cover and the batsmen run a sharp single, had the fielder hit direct the batsman would have been out
played towards third man for another single
flighted delivery on middle stump, the batsman comes forward and defends on the leg side
Jayawardene moves forward and tries to drive but the ball dips on him and spins past the outside edge, Dhoni whips off the bails but Jayawardene was safe
Jayawardene tries to sweep but misses and gets hit on the pad, Ojha appeals for lbw but Tyron says not out
played towards midwicket
defended on the off side
tossed up on middle stump, Ojha's giving the ball a lot of air, Jayawardene moves forward and works the ball off his pads to short fine leg, that's two maidens in a row for Ojha
good length on off stump, defended on the back foot towards the bowler
pushed into the gap between cover and point for a single
Jayawardene takes a step down the track and drives the ball hard and straight, Pathan does well to bend down and stop it on his follow through
fuller ball on off stump, Jayawardene meets it with a straight bat and drives towards long-off
Kapugedera plonks his front foot outside the line of off stump and tries to pull a ball that isn't all that short, he hits it to midwicket
Pathan bowls a short ball, too short for the ball sails over the batsman's head and the umpire calls it wide
wicket-to-wicket line from Pathan, Kapugedera defends on the front foot towards the leg side

brilliant bowling, and a well-deserved wicket for Ojha! He tosses the ball up and drifts it into off and middle stump, the length draws Jayawardene forward, the ball dips on the right-hander and turns away from the bat as Jayawardene tries to play the ball through cover, he ends up lobbing it tamely towards cover where Yuvraj takes the easiest of catches
he pitches it outside off and spins it into the batsman, Mubarak lets it go
left alone outside off stump
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Mubarak moves forward and pushes the ball towards point
bowled flatter through the air on off stump, Mubarak stays in his crease and blocks
he draws Kapugedera forward with his length and the ball goes straight past the outside edge
driven to long on for a single
Mubarak cuts the ball hard off the back foot but it gets stopped by Raina at point
tossed up on off stump from roudn the wicket to the left-hander, Mubarak drives off the front foot on the off side
played towards short third man for a quick single, RP sends in a wayward throw to the bowler's end
cut off the back foot through the off side
bowled flat through the air on middle stump, played off the pads on the leg side
Mubarak tries to work the ball off his pads but misses, the ball lobs up for Dhoni to collect
Mubarak strides forward and defends on the off side
finally they get a run off Ojha, Mubarak strides forward and drives the ball past the bowler towards long-on
Ojha pitches the ball outside off and spins it into the left-hander, Mubarak defends on the back foot
Mubarak tries to defend on the front foot but the ball spins into the left-hander and hits the inside edge, the fielder at short fine leg comes into play
defended back to the bowler
driven off the front foot towards long-on for a single
bowled flatter through the air on middle stump, Mubarak moves across and flicks the ball towards midwicket
Kapugedera begins to come down the track, realises he is there too early, and then waits for the ball to reach him before working it off his pads behind square
defended towards midwicket
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Kapugedera jumps down the track, realises he isn't to the pitch of the ball, and defends
quicker ball outside off, Kapugedera tries to cut but gets beaten
defended off the front foot towards the bowler
cut off the back foot through backward point
there's some width outside off stump and Kapugedera uses it to cut towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
deftly played! Mubarak came forward to defend and then opened the face at the last minute to steer the ball past the wicketkeeper towards third man
played towards short third man for a quick single, the fielder did not pick it up cleanly
tossed up from round the wicket into the right-hander, Kapugedera comes forward and drives the ball with the turn towards wide long-off

confident appeal for lbw! Kapugedera moved forward to defend and the straight ball appeared to hit him on the pad plumb in front of the stumps, Yuvraj can't believe he doesn't have a wicket but replays showed that there was an inside edge
played towards midwicket
pulled off the back foot toward deep midwicket
flighted delivery bowled slowly through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
Mubarak moves back and plays the ball with the spin off his pads towards square leg
bowled flatter through the air on off stump, defended back to the bowler
played off the back foot towards the bowler
tight line and length on off stump, defended on the back foot towards cover
driven through covers for a single
cut off the back foot towards point
Kapugedera steps out of his crease but doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, he gets hit on the pad while trying to defend
played through the covers for a single
defended back to the bowler
bowled flat through the air on middle and leg, played off the pads to midwicket
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
defended on the front foot on the leg side
bowled flat through the air just outside off, Kapugedera moves back and plays the ball to short third man
pulled towards the fielder at deep square leg
that's high in th air and four! Kapugedera charges Ojha and lofts him high into the air towards cow corner, Munaf runs to his right but can't get a hand on the ball it just about reaches the boundary
tossed up outside off stump, the ball pitches and spins past the outside edge of Kapugedera's front-foot defence

caught! Kapugedera lofts the ball inside out but he's hit it high in the air which gives RP Singh enough time to run to his left from long-off and take a well-judged catch, he ran extremely close to the boundary but was in complete control of his movements
quicker ball on middle and off, Thushara moves back and pulls the ball towards long-on
Mubarak comes forward and drives the ball towards long-on
played off the front foot towards short third man
Thushara tries to cut a ball that drifts across him but gets beaten by the quicker one
driven hard off the back foot towards cover where a mis-field allows runs
pushed off the front foot through covers for a single
swept towards the fielder at short fine leg
the ball turns sharply into the left-hander from outside off stump and hits the batsman on the back leg, the impact was just outside off stump and that's why Ojha's appeal was turned down
defended on the front foot
the flighted delivery pitches outside off and spins sharply into the left-hander rand beats the bat
Ojha bowls hyet another maiden over, that's his fourth if I haven't lost count
good length ball outside off, driven off the front foot
Thushara drives the ball off the front foot towards mid-off
banged in short outside off stump, Thushara  ducks under it
short of a length outside off, Pathan angles the ball into the left-hander, Thushara tries to drive off the back foot but gets beaten
short of a length outside off stump, Thushara tries to cut but his footwork and balance is poor and he is beaten
he's edged it for four! Thushara tries to drive straight off the front foot but the ball hits the outside edge and runs wide of Dhoni to the third-man boundary
full length on off and middle, Mubarak drives towards long-on for a single
banged in short by Zaheer, the batsman ducks under the bouncer
full ball nearly in the blockhole, driven down the ground towards long on
played off the back foot towards wide third man for a couple of runs
too full from Zaheer again, driven straight down the ground for more runs
flicked off the pads behind square for a single
short of a length and the batsman swivels to pull the ball towards deep square leg
full ball on the pads, Thushara flicks the ball towards deep backward square leg
well-directed bouncer from RP and Mubarak ducks under it
good length angling into off and middle stump, defended on the front foot towards the off side
Thushara tries to hit a length ball out of the ground but only manages to mis-time it over the bowler's head into the gap between mid-on and mid-off
he angles a full ball into the left-hander, Mubarak tries to flick but misses, the ball thuds into the pad and Pathan appeals, that would have missed leg stump
shot! Pathan gives Thushara room outside off stump, the batsman swings his bat hard and launches the ball into the gap at deep cover for four
Thushara throws his bat at another wide one and slices it towards third man
fuller ball on off stump, Mubarak moves forward and plays the ball back towards the bowler
Pathan bowls the slower ball outside off stump, Mubarak is beaten and he lets it go in the end, hmmm that's been called wide
played off the back foot towards point for the single, the fielder was on the edge of the circle
expensive over from Pathan, Thushara gets the last ball away wide of Dhoni for four to third man
the line is too straight and it allows Thushara to move across his stumps and pull the ball towards the fine leg boundary
short once again and this time Mubarak pulls the ball towards deep square leg
fantastic! Thushara sees mid-off in the circle and lofts a length ball over the head of the fielder for four more
good length on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover
RP Singh strays down leg side and Mubarak misses with his attempt to hit down to fine leg
another boundary! Short ball and Mubarak goes for the pull, he top-edges it towards the fine-leg boundary, poor bowling from RP
quick delivery at 137kmh outside off stump, Mubarak tries to cut but misses
bowled flat through the air from over the wicket, defended on the front foot
Thushara moves back and works the ball through wide mid-on, they run hard and complete the second
played towards midwicket for another single
tossed up outside off stump, Mubarak moves on to the front foot and gets a leading edge through cover
Mubarak moves back to cut a flat ball towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
width offered outside off stump, cut off the back foot towards third man
Zaheer returns for another spell and surprises Mubarak with a rather high full toss, the umpire doesn't think it was too high, Mubarak defends on the leg side
short of a length and Mubarak uses the space to rock back and pull the ball into the gap between deep midwicket and long on
this time the short ball is well-directed and Mubarak moves out of the line of the ball and lets it go
the length is full and Mubarak lofts the ball off the front foot straight past the bowler, the man at long-on runs to his right and fields
another short of a length ball, the batsman tries to play it to third man but misses
full delivery in the block hole, Thushara drives off the front foot through cover point
streaky streaky! Thushara swings across the line at a length delivery outside off, he is looking for the big hit over midwicket but the thick edge flies down to the third-man boundary
Mubarak picks the slower ball and cuts towards point for  a single
terrific placement from Thushara, he's consistently hitting it over Dhoni or wide of Dhoni for four! He tries to pull this time and the top edge goes to the fine-leg boundary
pushed off the front foot towards long off for a single
it's Mubarak this time! He tries to cut and the bottom edge goes towards third man, he doesn't have Thushara's luck so the fielder gets to the ball before it reaches the boundary
the slower ball on off stump, defended with soft hands towards the off side for a single
low full toss outside off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
bowled full in the blockhole, Mubarak manages to dig it out back to the bowler
played towards RP at mid-on for a single, close call at the bowler's end, a direct hit and he would have been out

Thushara digs out an excellent yorker towards the leg side and then sprints the single, he dives to make his crease, that's his maiden ODI fifty, terrific innings from Thushara, he landed on his elbow when he dived but he's alright
another full ball on off stump, Mubarak defends on the off side, only four runs off that over
played towards long-on for a single
brilliant placement! RP gives Mubarak a length delivery and he pulls the ball hard over midwicket, he's picked out the gap in the deep perfectly
Thushara tries to slog across the line towards midwicket, it was the slower ball and he connected with the toe end of the bat and the ball went towards cover
another slower ball outside off stump, Mubarak swings too hard and too early and gets beaten
Mubarak comes forward and tries to hit towards the leg side but gets beaten by a full ball outside off stump
short of a length ball on leg and middle, Thushara moves across his stumps and hits the ball past short fine leg, he hasn't timed it well so will get only two
another ball on leg stump but this time Thushara fails to connect with the pull, he gets hit on the body
full ball outside off stump, Mubarak gets beaten

that's gone miles in the air! Mubarak swung his bat hard and hit a length ball high over midwicket, the ball was in the air for ages but it fell safely between three fielders who were trying to get under it
tight line and length on middle stump, the batsman can't get it away, not much he could do another that
played through midwicket for a single to end the innings

inn2.comm: he starts with a good length ball on off stump, Kohli strides forward and defends with bat close to pad
Kohli gets behind the line of a short of a length ball and defends towards cover
Kohli moves forward to a straighter ball on middle stump and defends towards the off side, he was initially looking to play on the leg side
tight line and length just outside off stump, defended on the front foot towards point
Kohli moves on to the front foot and plays the ball off a good length back to the bowler

super ball, Kulasekara pitches the ball on a good length just outside off stump, Kohli moves forward to play it through the leg side but the ball seams away from the right-hander and beats the outside edge, Kulasekara starts with a maiden over

huge huge huge appeal for caught behind but Doctrove is unmoved, the Sri Lankans can't believe it, Gambhir pushed forward at a good length ball and tried to defend with bat extremely close to the front pad, the ball moved away from the left-hander off the seam and appeared to hit the edge, Sangakkara was sure of it, the bat had hit the pad but there was also a deflection as the ball passed the bat
defended on the front foot
Gambhir tries to play the ball off his pads but misses, India get off the mark with a leg bye
the good length ball pitches outside off and seams away from Kohli who lets the ball go
the ball is seaming sharply under the lights, Kohli prods forward at one that is closer to off stump but the seam movement takes it past the outside edge
played towards fine leg for a single
played towards point off the front foot
a full ball swings into the right-hander, Kohli tries to play the ball towards midwicket but a thick inside edge goes towards square leg
Kulasekara swings the ball into Kohli who moves across his stumps and tries to flick, he mises and gets hit on the pad

another loud appeal for lbw, Kulasekara pitches the ball just outside off and cuts it sharply into the right-hander, Kohli gets caught on the crease and gets hit on the back leg, the impact was too high though, replays indicate it would have clipped the top of the stumps
well-directed bouncer catches Kohli by surprise as he tries to come on the front foot
good length delivery just outside off stump, left alone by tthe batsmen
Thushara pitches on a good length and brings the ball into the left-hander, Gambhir closes the face and plays the ball towards midwicket
shot! Gambir takes Thushara by surprise by walking down the pitch and moving towards the off side, he gets to the pitch of the ball and plays the square drive through the gap at cover point
short of a length just outside off stump, Gambhir tries to cut and the top edge flies over slips for four to third man
too straight from Thushara and Gambhir moves across and plays the ball behind square, that came off his pad
Kohli defends on the front foot towards the off side, Gambhir wants the single but Kohli sends him back, Gambhir has to hurry to make his ground
Gambhir takes a step out of the crease once again but Kulasekara bowls a shorter length and cramps him for room
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Gambhir backs away towards leg and tries force the ball through the off side, he mis-times it into the gap at cover point and gets the single
smashing shot! The length is a trifle short and Kohli picks it up early, he stays on the front foot and pulls the ball powerfully over the deep square leg boundary
Kulasekara strays down leg side, Kohli missed the leg glance and Sangakkara appealed for the catch
Kohli presses on to the front foot and opens the face to steer the ball behind point
fuller length on middle stump, Gambhir strides forward and drives towards midwicket
Kohli strides forward to a good length delivery, which angles across him, and punches towards cover point where the fielder slides to his left and makes the save
defended on the leg side off the front foot
driven firmly off the front foot towards cover where Mubarak dives to his right to cut off any runs
short of a length and wide outside off stump, Kohli stands on the front foot and plays a slap-drive towards cover, he hit that hard but straight to Mubarak
fuller length and closer to off stump, the ball seams across Kohli who tries to open the face of the bat and play it towards third man
that's hit with a lot of power! Kohli sees width outside the off stump once again and drives the ball hard through cover point, no one is cutting this off
Gambhir dabs a short of a length ball towards mid-off and immediately sprints the single to Fernando
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
good length delivery angling into the right-hander, Kohli strides forward and defends towards cover point
Kohli gets on to the front foot and closes the face of the bat to play the ball with the angle into him behind square leg
Kohli moves his front foot across his stumps and tries to flick, he gets hit on the pad by one that cuts into him from outside off stump, Kulasekara appeals but the impact was too high
this time Kohli doesn't move his front foot that far across and manages to tap the ball deftly past square leg for two more
excellent running, Gambhir dropped the ball into the ground near his feet and Kohli set off instantly for a single
the short ball slants wide across the right-hander, Kohli's feet stay rooted to the crease as he reaches out for it, he gets beaten
better line and length, closer to off stump, Kohli lets it go
short of a length close to off stump, Kohli stays in his crease and opens the face of the bat to push the ball towards point

Kohli moves back and across and flicks the ball in front of square leg, he didn't hit that too hard but hit it well enough to get two, the batsmen hesitated during the second run but completed it comfortably in the end
quick running once again, Kohli pushes the ball towards the silly mid-off region and Gambhir sprints through for the single
played towards square leg once again
shot! The line is too straight on middle stump, Kohli comes forward and plays a whippy flick off his pads through midwicket for four
Kohli moves forward and across to a good length ball and drives towards mid-on for one, he played that just wide of the fielder
Gambhir charges and throws his bat at one that slants across him, he was looking to smash it over the off side but didn't make contact

caught! Sangakkara's move pays off immediately! Gambhir sees the ball angling across him and tries to steer it towards third man, he plays away from his body and gets a thick edge and Sangakkara anticipates it beautifully and takes the catch to his left, he gives Gambhir a send-off as well, probably because of the nick earlier in the innings
good length delivery outside off stump, Yuvraj lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
Thushara seams the ball away from the right-hander and gets bounce as well, Kohli chases the ball and gets beaten
Thushara seams the ball away from the right-hander and gives Kohli a lot of width, the length was on the shorter side as well, Kohli gets under the ball and cuts it over the infield at point
Kohli chases another one and tries to hit it through cover point, this time the length is better and the ball beats the bat
Kohli pushes off the front foot but the ball seams away from the right-hander off a good length and beats the bat
big swing away from the right-hander, Kohli fends hopelessly at the ball and it whizzes past his outside edge, superb bowling this
Kohli manages to drive the ball with a straight bat wide of the fielder at mid-off
Kohli strides forward and pushes the ball behind point towards third man
Kulasekara sends down a bouncer and Kohli ducks

he's finally got the lbw! Kulasekara has repeatedly hit Kohli on the pad as he moves across his stumps to the ball that cuts into the right-hander, the impact has been high on previous occasions, but this time the ball hits him on the knee roll and the umpire raises the finger

Kulasekara pitches on a  good length around off stump and cuts the ball into the left-hander, Raina tries to drive of the back foot and plays outside the line of the ball, he gets beaten between the bat and the body, Sangakkara fails to collect cleanly
defended towards gully
Yuvraj moves on to the back foot and punches a short of a length ball with immaculate timing through covers for four
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Raina moves back and across to a short of a length ball and defends on the off side
Raina moves across his stumps and turns a length delivery off his pads towards square leg
once again Yuvraj drives the ball through the gap between cover and mid-off but this time he hasn't hit it hard enough to get four
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Yuvraj strides forward and defends but he gets an inside edge towards square leg
Yuvraj gets behind the line of a good length delivery and defends towards the bowler
Yuvraj stays in his crease and defends a length delivery towards cover point
that's a fraction short and that is all Yuvraj needs, he stands on the front foot, twists his body, and pulls the ball over wide mid-on for four
short of a length on middle stump, played off the back foot towards square leg
wide outside off stump and Raina misses out, he hits the back-foot cover drive with a lot of power but doesn't find the gap in the in-field

Kulasekara's given him another chance and Raina accepts gleefully, the ball is short and wide and Raina moves back and punches the ball to the left of the fielder at cover, he had hit the previous ball straight to him
too straight, on leg and middle, Yuvraj moves back and whips the ball off his pads towards fine leg

massive appeal for lbw, the ball was full and straight, and Raina went across his crease and tried to flick across the line, he missed and the ball hit him low on the pad, that looked out but the ball might have just pitched outside leg stump, Doctrove says not out
short ball outside off stump, Raina leaps on to the back foot and lets it go
good length ball on off stump, Raina tries to drive through the off side but gets an inside edge into the ground and back to the bowler
Fernando strays down leg side, that's a wide
good length on off stump, Raina defends on the front foot
Raina jumps on to the back foot and flicks a short of a length ball towards long leg
that's a length ball and Raina plants his front foot forward and slogs the ball past mid-on for four

caught! Raina's holed out! The length wasn't short enough to pull but Raina tried to smash it over midwicket, he got a top edge which went high in the air towards mid-off where Fernando settled under the catch, rather mindless shot that was
full on the stumps, Yuvraj looked to play straight but got an edge towards point
wide outside off stump, Yuvraj lets it go
full and straight, Yuvraj goes for the drive but gets an inside edge on to the pad
full delivery leaves the left-hander, Yuvraj is drawn into the drive but gets beaten
short of a length on off and middle, Sharma gets on to the back foot and defends
short of a length outside off stump, Sharma stands on the back foot and steers the ball past gully for a single
good length delivery pitches outside off stump and slants across the left-hander, Yuvraj strides forward and lets it go
Fernando slants the ball across the left-hander once again but the line is just a touch wider and the umpire penalises the bowler
good length from Fernando outside off stump, Yuvraj moves back and across and shoulders arms
short of a length on leg and middle, Yuvraj jumps on to the back foot and tucks the ball off his hips towards square leg
too straight, that was the ideal line for the left-hander but Sharma was able to work it off his pads through midwicket
short ball on middle stump, pulled off the back foot towards deep square leg
good length delivery on middle stump, Yuvraj moves forward and pushes the ball on the leg side

lbw! But that was a poor decision, Kulasekara pitched the ball outsid eoff stump and cut the ball into the right-hander, Sharma thrust his front pad outside the line of off stump while defending and got hit on the pad, Kulasekara appealed and umpire Tyron raised the finger in a flash, the impact however was outside the line of off stump
left alone outside off stump
full ball outside off stump, Dhoni strides forward and drives towards point
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Yuvraj stands tall on the back foot and tries to drive on the off side, he gets an inside edge towards midwicket
good length ball outside off stump, left alone by Dhoni
Dhoni leans forward and closes the face to play an incoming delivery towards square leg
Fernando pushes Yuvraj on to the back foot with his length and pace, he's averaging around 138 kmh, Yuvraj defends back to the bowler
Yuvraj moves back and opens the face to guide the ball towards third man
Fernando pitches on a good length outside off and seams the ball away from the right-hander, Dhoni stays in his crease and lets it go

bowled him! Mendis has gone Yuvraj first ball! He's tormented him in this series! It was the ball that went straight on across the left-hander, yuvraj stayed in his crease and tried to push the ball on the off side, the ball hit the inside edge and then went on to the stumps, it may have hit the pad as well
Pathan leans forward and defends on the off side
Pathan replies with aggression, he plants his foot down the pitch and lofts Mendis from outside off towards the wide long-on boundary
quicker ball on off stump, Pathan moves back and defends
bowled quicker through the air on off stump, defended towards Kapugedera at silly point
bowled flat and quick on middle stump, Pathan goes deep in his crease and pushes the ball towards midwicket

Pathan drives the ball on the up towards cover, Pathan sets off for the single after the fielder at cover fumbles but mid-off moves to his right and fields, Dhoni sends Pathan back, there's a direct hit at the batsman's end but Pathan is safe
good length ball on middle and off, Pathan leans forward and flicks the ball towards square leg

bowled him! That's the end of Dhoni! They are dancing in the stands! Fernando bowled one full and fast, swinging into the right-hander, Dhoni hardly moved his feet as he tried to play across the line, the ball slipped through the gap between bat and pad and crashed into the stumps
bowled full and wide down leg side, that's a wide, Fernando was looking for the yorker
good length ball on off stump, defended on the back foot towards point
full toss on the pads, Zaheer moves across his stumps and flicks the ball towards long leg
full ball on leg stump, Pathan leans across and flicks the ball behind square for a single
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Mendis turns the ball sharply away from the left-hander, Pathan defends on the off side
Pathan strides forward and blocks
bowled flat through the air on off stump, defended back to the bowler
tossed up on off stump, Pathan leans forward and drives towards cover
the off break turns and bounces to hit Pathan's outside edge, the ball goes wide of first slip towards short third man, Pathan wants the single but doesn't get it
good length delivery on off stump, Zaheer moves back and across and defends towards the bowler
good length delivery just outside off stump, Zaheer gets an outside edge towards gully
full ball on middle stump, Zaheer moves deep in his crease and hits the ball between midwicket and mid-on
good length delivery on off stump, Zaheer moves back, gets behind the line, and defends
Zaheer stays in his crease and defends the ball towards cover
full length on off stump, Zaheer stays on the back foot, covers his off stump, and plays the ball towards mid-off with a straight bat

caught! Mendis tossed the ball up around off stump and turned the offbreak away from Pathan who tried to drive on the front foot, he gets an outside edge towards second slip where Warnapura took the catch, that turned a long way
bowled quick and straight, RP stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
Mendis breaks the carrom ball away from the right-hander off the pitch, RP has no clue and gets beaten as he tries to defend on the off side
the offbreak this time, RP defends on the leg side
RP strides forward and defends with bat close to front pad, that is the one that goes straight through
Mendis ends the over with the offbreak, RP stays in his crease and turns the ball past the fielder at leg slip
full ball on off stump, RP stays on the back foot and blocks
the length is full on off and middle once again, Fernando is looking for the yorker, RP hits it wide off the fielder at mid-on

was there a nick? Sangakkara appealed but Fernando didn't, Doctrove said not out, there was a massive nick as RP tried to push off the back foot, big nick, big sound, big deviation and Sangakkara took the catch easily, but the bowler didn't appeal and so the umpire said not out, Sangakkara went up immediately though
defended on the back foot
defended on the off side on the back foot
RP moves back and defends a short of a length ball towards point, actually that was more of an outside edge
Zaheer leans forward and defends to silly point

that's plumb, absolutely plumb! That's the straight one from Mendis, it pitches on off and heads towards middle, Zaheer pushes forward in defence and gets hit on the pad in front of middle, no doubt there
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Ojha gets beaten by the offbreak that spins past his forward defence
another offbreak pitches in line with the stumps, draws Ojha forward, and then spins past the bat
Ojha pushes forward to defend but gets beaten yet again, Mendis bowls a wicket maiden
that's a length ball and RP hits the ball through midwicket, the outfield is a little slow so the ball won't reach the boundary
Fernando pitches in line with the stumps and seams the ball across the left-hander, Ojha defends but gets beaten
Ojha stays in his crease and plays the ball down to third man with an angled bat
caught! That's no 9! Full ball outside off stump, RP slashes at it and edges the catch to second slip, Jayawardene catches it at head height, that ball traveled to him quickly
banged in short over the stumps, Munaf backs away and lets it go
full ball outside off stump, Munaf backs away and lofts the ball wide of the fielder at mid-on for four, he connected extremely well
defended on the front foot towards point
Ojha's gone after him! He plants his front foot forward and hits Mendis over midwicket for four
that's the end of the game! Ojha tries to repeat the shot over midwicket but gets a top edge that goes high in the air towards mid-off  where Kulasekara judges the catch to perfection
